title: Red Pepper Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Take-out, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A casual nice Chinese-Vietnamese restaurant with some vegetarian and vegan appetizers and main entrees on the menu. Several of the vegetarian options contain tofu, and the kitchen will substitute tofu for meat in non-vegetarian dishes upon request. Specialties include the vegetable dumplings and sesame bean curd.
